value.name: The Savant
value.overview: Tense thriller meets family drama as an undercover investigator known as “The Savant” balances life at home with tracking online hate groups to stop domestic extremists before they act.

value.name: Kubikiri Cycle -  Aoiro Savant to Zaregoto Tsukai
value.original_name: クビキリサイクル 青色サヴァンと戯言遣い
value.overview: The story revolves around the protagonist "I" and the murders and mysteries he encounters. He tries in vain to stay out of the story, but instead he always gets dragged into the center of everything. Even though it seems that he contributes a lot, he always finds out that whatever he did was meaningless in the end.
